mission.name: Find the way to join the isle

missionstate.description: Discover the isle.
You found the entrance of the Isle.
Find the Village on Kindernia.
You founded Kindernia Village.
Finish the Chain Quest on Kindernia.
You manage to finish the Chain quest on Kindernia Isle.
Find the pastry decorations around the isle, the first one is at north of Candis.
You founded the first pastry decoration, find the second one.
You founded the second pastry decoration, find the thirst one.
You founded the thirst pastry decoration, find the fourth one.
You founded the fourth pastry decoration, find the fifth one.
You founded the fifth pastry decoration, find the sixth one.
You founded the sixth pastry decoration, go back talk to Candis.
Use the teleport near Candis to start finding the boss room, be aware the candy monsters are raging!
You finded the first isle, continue to see where it goes.
You discovered a new one, follow the path until find the boss room.
Thirst isle, the isle is so big and beautiful.
Some Nible Maw, defeat it!
This big donut make me hungry!
You discovered the boss room, you will now be able to use the teleport to come here directly next time.
